files.content: "use client" import * as React from "react" import { ArrowUpRightIcon, PaletteIcon, FilePlus2Icon, LayoutTemplateIcon, SearchIcon, PenToolIcon, } from "lucide-react" import { CommandDialog, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList, CommandSeparator, CommandShortcut, } from "@/registry/default/ui/command" export function Search() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) React.useEffect(() => { const down = (e: KeyboardEvent) => { if (e.key === "k" && (e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey)) { e.preventDefault() setOpen((open) => !open) } } document.addEventListener("keydown", down) return () => document.removeEventListener("keydown", down) }, []) return ( <> No matches found. New project ⌘N New template ⌘T Start design ⌘S Go to workspace Go to assets Go to documentation Switch theme ⌘⇧T ) }
